title: What has happpened to Dr. Tom Wertheimer. He was great!
text:
Dr. Thomas Wertheimer of Wilmington surrendered his medical license
on Feb. 7, 2008, and admitted in a consent order issued on May 27,
2008 by the N.C. Medical Board that he had a substance abuse problem
and had diverted controlled substances to his personal use, according
to medical board records.

In a Dec. 18, 2008 consent order from the medical board, he was found
in compliance with a plan for treatment and monitoring and his full
medical license was restored on March 19, 2009.

According to medical board records, he is currently practicing on the
staff at Columbus Regional Healthcare in Whiteville.
